name: balance
description: The amount of ESDT tokens the address possesses.

name: identifier
description: The identifier field is composed of the `token` field and the `nonce` field, hex encoded.

name: isSmartContract
description: True if the address is a smart contract address.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the address balance was changed.

name: token
description: The token name of the token.

name: tokenNonce
description: The sequence number of the token. This field can be empty in the case of `FungibleESDT`.
